featured.text: Fireflies, small beetles that live in many warmer parts of the world, use light to attract a mate.

definition.zh_def: 甲蟲，一種昆蟲，通常有堅硬的外殼和觸角。
definition.en_def: A beetle is an insect characterized by a hard shell and antennae.
definition.example: The beetle crawled slowly across the garden path.
